tasks.title: Organize Existing Image Assets
tasks.description: Index and cluster the existing image library to enable style-consistent selection.
tasks.details:
COMPLETED 2025-01-17:
1. Implemented 'ImageIngestionAgent' with project tagging support
2. Implemented 'ImageEmbeddingService' with DBSCAN clustering
3. Verified KG storage for project relationships and cluster assignments
4. Documentation at 'docs/image_project_tags_and_clustering.md'

tasks.title: Ingest Trends into Knowledge Graph
tasks.description: Connect the trend discovery engine to the Knowledge Graph.
tasks.details:
COMPLETED 2025-01-17:
1. Created 'scripts/brainrot/ingest_trends.py'
2. Defined 'trend:Trend' schema in the script
3. Ingested 50+ trends from US and IT into KG
4. Linked trends to concepts for future matching

tasks.title: Trend-Driven Book Generation
tasks.description: Create books based on real-time trends using existing assets.
tasks.details:
Create 'scripts/create_trend_book.py' that:
1. Selects top trend from KG (Task 2)
2. Uses 'ChildrensBookOrchestrator(project_id=trend_id)'
3. Uses clustering (Task 1) to select consistent image style
4. Generates book using existing McKinsey workflow
